import { Props, Story, Preview } from "@storybook/addon-docs/blocks";
import { Tray} from '../../../Components/Molecules';

# Tray

`import { Tray } from "@elevenia/master-ui/Components/Molecules";`

Tray is a container for fullscreen tray in mobile.
Consists of TrayHeader, TrayContent, and TrayFooter.<br/>
Tray needs [Button](/?path=/docs/atom-button--basic) or [ButtonLink](/?path=/docs/atom-buttonlink--basic) as a trigger.
